item.description:
Please, bring something to eat or drink: wine, cheese, bread, crackers, fruits, etc... Email me for the address if you are going.

This member is inviting us and will be trusting us to her home. Please, remember to be considerate.

We will be able to stay until 9:00 P.M.

Thanks and have fun!
item.why:
Salut, tout le monde,
Our friend Roanne was kind enough to invite us to her home in Lexington. This will give members in that area an opportunity to attend. Everybody is welcome, of course!
A bientôt, Frantz

group.name: The Boston French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Rendez-vous à Lexington!
